login.error: An internal application error has occurred. Please try logging in later.
login.throttle: Too many login attempts. Please try again in :seconds :unit.

logout.error: An internal application error has occurred. Try logout later.

reset_password_confirm.success: You have successfully set a new password. You can now log in with your new password.
reset_password_confirm.code_not_equal: You used a broken password reset link. Try resetting your password again.

reset_password.success: An email with instructions on how to reset your password has been sent to the email address you provided.
reset_password.fail: Failed to send message to specified email. Try reset your password later.
reset_password.error: An internal application error occurred. Try reset your password later.

register.success: You have successfully registered on the site.
register.error: An internal application error occurred. Please try registering later.

mass_delete.success: User IDs:":ids" has been successfully deleted.
Role IDs:":ids" has been successfully deleted.
File IDs:":ids" has been successfully deleted.
